column19:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Giordano makes life easy for frequent travellers with their well designed bags. This stylish black bag can be carried as a laptop bag or a travel bag on short trips
column20:
or as both. It can also be carried in multiple ways.

  • Product Details

  • Black travel bag with a brand badge in front and structured
column22: padded haul loop and a removable
column23:
adjustable sling strap
One main zipped compartment with three open pockets and three pen holders attached to the lining
column24: Velcro strap attached to the base to secure belongings
column26:
removable strap that can be attached in multiple ways using Velcro closure or remove completely to accommodate a laptop
One zipped compartment in front
One flap at the back with a Velcro closure to slide on to a trolley handle
Spiked rubber patches at the base
Warranty: 1 year

  • Material & Care

  • Synthetic

column27:
dry cloth when needed
